review: I ve been taking my both kids to this doctor since 3 years..He is very patient, gives best advice, gives medicine only if needed and most importantly gentle with kids..I highly recommend this Doctor.
Doctor  was very patient and answered all my queries.Gave enough time to talk to my kid and me aswell.guided me and counselled me about the sons growth.
consulted for my sons penis balooning and rash , he explained and given suggestions in a reasonable way. i recommend this doctor for sure.
